text: aight bros long story short i applied for UI march 27th, just got denied today and also invited to apply for PUA, and i cannot upload my goddamn 1099 to their shitty ass website. all i get is a "there was a problem with the system, please try again later" this is fucking ridiculous the website is working fine and ive tried to upload it in multiple file types.
title: Cannot upload documents for PUA
